content: plushy heart crochet got a crush on crochet hook up a cute little plushy heart using your sock weight or dk scraps each heart takes less than 20gr of yarn and works up in only a few hours make one for everyone you love including yourself please note this pattern is worked in spirals you do not need to slip to join and there is no chain at the beginning of the round just keep working in a spiral for a smooth invisible join we use scrap yarn to mark the sides of the heart where increases and decreased are placed as you work your rounds you will need to move the stitch markers up
